title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-4.3 - Determination of county equalization rates pursuant to title 2, article 8 of the Real Property Tax Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-4.3 - Determination of county equalization rates pursuant to title 2, article 8 of the Real Property Tax Law

State Regulations
(a) ORPTS shall notify in writing the clerk of the county legislative body and the
county director that county equalization rates cannot be determined because the

State equalization rate for the current and prior year will not be established
as final on or before the last date for county equalization. (b) Subject to the limitations as provided
for in section
842
of the Real Property Tax Law, a county
equalization rate may be rescinded and reestablished where: (1)
the change in level of assessment for the
current roll is discovered to be incorrect and the percent difference between
the original county equalization rate and the revised county equalization rate
is one percent or more; or
(2)
the

State equalization rate for the prior roll is rescinded and
reestablished. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
